msg: Get ready to defend your server!
You've defeated this gelatonous fiend! Searching through its ship you find alien tech to sell.
You scare off the alien. It runs back to its ship and takes off but drops its wallet so you take it.
You blow up the alien and its ship! The president is satisfied and rewards you.
You've failed to fight off the alien and it shoots its lazer-beam eyes into the server.
You are overrun by the jelly aliens and they shoot at the channel's citizens!
The Jelly Alien stands tall and prepares to attack. Quick! It's susceptible to both punches and kicks!
The alien towers over you but do not falter, this only makes it easier to hit!
The Jelly Alien crouches under all your punches
The Jelly Alien crouches, avoiding all the punches!
The Jelly Alien jumps and almost seems to hover just above your kicking range.
The Jelly Alien jumps up high thwarting your attempts to kick it!
